00046 // =============================================================================
00047 // set frequency
00048 
00049 // if our frequency is .5 hz, it means that our period is 2 seconds
00050 // if our frequency is 2 hz, it means tt our period is .5 second
00051 // if fq is 4 hz, period is .25 seconds
00052 // p == 1 / fq
00053 // fq == 1/ p

00057 // =============================================================================
00059 void WaveSquare :: setParameter(const ParameterName p, 
00060                                boost::shared_ptr<Generator> g, 
00061                                ParameterContext pc)
00062 {
00063     // this assignment does not yet work    
00064     switch (p) {                       
00065         case parameterNameRate:       
00066             parameterRate = g;
00067             // this switch only permits certain kinds of cases
00068             switch (pc) {     
00069                 case parameterContextNameFrequency:
00070                     parameterRateContext = pc;
00071                     break;
00072                 case parameterContextNamePeriod:
00073                     parameterRateContext = pc;
00074                     break;
00075                 // default is frequency
00076                 default:
00077                     parameterRateContext = parameterContextNameFrequency;
00078             }
00079             break;                         
00080         case parameterNameMinimum:       
00081             parameterMinimum = g;                  
00082             break;              
00083         case parameterNameMaximum:                         
00084             parameterMaximum = g;                  
00085             break;              
00086     } // end case            
00087 }

00094 // =============================================================================
00095 double WaveSquare :: getValueAtSample(long sampleTime)
00096 {
00097 
00098     double periodSamples = 0;
00099 
00100     switch (parameterRateContext) {     
00101         case parameterContextNameFrequency:
00102             // divide by one
00103             periodSamples = secondTimeToSampleTime(1. / parameterRate->getValueAtSample(sampleTime), outputModel->getSamplingRate());
00104             break;
00105         case parameterContextNamePeriod:
00106             // do not divide by one
00107             periodSamples = secondTimeToSampleTime( parameterRate->getValueAtSample(sampleTime), outputModel->getSamplingRate());
00108             break;
00109     };
00110     double phase = 0; // between 0 and 1
00111     double amp; // output 
00112 
00113     // convert from Convert
00114 //     double secondTime = sampleTimeToSecondTime(sampleTime, 
00115 //                         outputModel->getSamplingRate());
00116 
00117     // shift the desired time by the phase-scaled period
00118     if (phase != 0) {
00119         sampleTime += periodSamples * phase;
00120     };
00121 
00122     // find time position within the period 
00123     // if our period is 2, and our initial secondTime is 2.5, this
00124     // returns .5 
00125     sampleTime = fmod(sampleTime, periodSamples);
00126 
00127     // if less than half of period
00128     if (sampleTime < periodSamples * .5)
00129         amp = 0;
00130     else
00131         amp = 1;
00132 
00133     return denorm(amp, 
00134                   parameterMinimum->getValueAtSample(sampleTime),
00135                   parameterMaximum->getValueAtSample(sampleTime)
00136             );
00137 };

00141 double WaveSquare :: getValueAtSecond(double secondTime)
00142 {
00143     return getValueAtSample(secondTimeToSampleTime(secondTime));
00144 
00145 }
